title: LoL on Samsung Galaxy Book
body:
Does anyone know how well league would run on this?  It's a newer product offered on Verizon which you can add to an unlimited data plan.  4GB RAM, 128GB SSD, Windows 10.

Thoughts?

replies.body: It looks like you're hitting the required specs so far, but be sure to check out all the [**minimum specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) as well.
